pageContext.claim: “Whatever happened to Hillary campaign manager Podesta’s BROTHER? Wasn’t he caught, forced to leave his firm, with BIG BAD things to happen? Why did nothing ever happen to him, only to the ‘other’ side?”
pageContext.analysis: The lobbyist Tony Podesta was accused of violating foreign lobbying rules, but the Justice Department later dropped the case. Paul Manafort and other Trump associates pleaded guilty after they were charged.
